remarks: The ratio of nonnegative and positive numbers is nonnegative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
ltmul1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv1dd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ltmul1dd $p |- ( ph -> ( A x. C ) < ( B x. C ) ) $.
